questions_and_notes: Don't think "time: mean within hours time: maximum over hours" is CF compliant; only "withiin days" or "within years".  Note that in general "area: mean" will give a lower maximum if data are mapped to a coarser grid than the original.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 2 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean time: mean within hours time: maximum over hours
comment: In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.
